Government
==========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Agendas & Minutes](https://fredericksburgtx.portal.civicclerk.com/)

   Find agendas, minutes, & presentations online and at City Hall.
2. #### [Boards & Commissions](https://www.fbgtx.org/174/Boards-Commissions)

   Access the city's boards and commissions, including minutes, agendas, and member information.
3. #### [City Calendar](https://www.fbgtx.org/calendar.aspx)

   View events and activities occurring throughout the city.
4. #### [City Council](https://www.fbgtx.org/84/City-Council)

   View meeting information and requirements, agendas and minutes, and learn about the open meetings act.
5. #### [City Holidays](https://www.fbgtx.org/190/City-Holidays)

   View the holidays when the city offices, recycling center, and landfill will be closed.
6. #### [City Manager](https://www.fbgtx.org/66/City-Manager)

   Read the duties and selection guidelines for the city manager.
7. #### [City Secretary](https://www.fbgtx.org/256/City-Secretary)

   View agenda and minutes, find information about elections, and public information and records.
8. #### [Code of Ordinances](https://www.fbgtx.org/38/Code-of-Ordinances)

   Access ordinances for various departments, divisions, and situations within the city.
9. #### [Comprehensive Plan and Parks Master Plan](https://www.fbgtx.org/1128/Comprehensive-Plan-and-Parks-Master-Plan)

   Read about the Comprehensive Plan Update process and the development of the 2024 Comprehensive Plan and Parks Master Plan.
10. #### [Elections](https://www.fbgtx.org/224/Elections)

    Find registration, voting location, and absentee ballot information.
11. #### [Gillespie County](http://www.gillespiecounty.org/)

    Access the Gillespie County website.
12. #### [Home Rule Charter](https://www.fbgtx.org/DocumentCenter/View/7710/Fredericksburg-TX-Home-Rule-Charter-2024)

    Read the rule charter, adopted in 1991, to learn more about the city government. It was last amended in 2024.
13. #### [Landowner's Bill of Rights](https://www.fbgtx.org/DocumentCenter/View/3639/Landowners-Bill-of-Rights)
14. #### [Public Notices & Bid Announcements](https://www.fbgtx.org/380/Public-Notices-Bid-Announcements)

    Find notices for the residents of the Fredericksburg.
